Algebra 2 - Determining direct variation from a table

\begin{array}{|c|c|}\n\hline \mathrm{x} & \mathrm{y} \\\n\hline 27 & 9 \\\n\hline 30 & 10 \\\n\hline 60 & 20 \\\n\hline\n\end{array}[imath]\hline \mathrm{x} & \mathrm{y} [/imath] [imath]\hline 27 & 9 [/imath] [imath]\hline 30 & 10 [/imath] [imath]\hline 60 & 20 [/imath] [imath]\hline[/imath]
